^^A  Color-code metadata values.
\newcommand{\metavalue}[1]{\textcolor{blue}{#1}}

^^A  Provide access to today's date, as formatted by hyperxmp.sty.
\makeatletter
\let\todayISO=\hyxmp@today
\makeatother
